paper_abstract: A connection between Hamming codes and Heapsort is shown, namely, that they can both be derived, the first from straightforward error correcting codes and the second from a simple sorting method, using almost identical derivation processes. It is then demonstrated that the same process can work for other well-known methods. This might trigger similar derivations in the future. (C) 2013 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: On the connection between Hamming codes, Heapsort and other methods
